mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medicine case
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This item was owned by Dr. James E. Copeland (1845-1937) of Round Hill, Virginia. It was donated to the University of Virginia by Copeland's grandson, Edward V. Copeland, in 1971. Hand-labelled vials containing sundry pills, powders, liquids; note "I bought this medicine case with another and larger one with other things at the sale of the late John Alexander Klein, M.D." signed J.E Copeland M.D in reference to purchase.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Drugs
Medical instruments and apparatus
